publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5891 Ms Wendy Alexander: Congratulations to Renfrewshire Carers’ Centre—That the Parliament congratulates Renfrewshire Carers’ Centre, part of The Princess Royal Trust for Carers’ Network, on its successful application to the Big Lottery Fund and understands that, working closely with Renfrewshire Council, Diane and the team at Renfrewshire Carers’ Centre have been awarded £273,639, which will enable the centre to develop and deliver a crucial and valuable project to help older carers and create bespoke emergency care plans should a crisis arise or they become unable to continue their caring role.
